wranglerMigrationNotes.reason: Align with current Cloudflare Workers tooling and APIs. Wrangler 4.x provides improved type safety, better local development experience, and compatibility with the latest Workers runtime features.
wranglerMigrationNotes.compatibility: No breaking changes required. The existing wrangler.toml configuration, dev/build/deploy scripts, and Worker routes are fully compatible with wrangler 4.x. All commands (wrangler dev, wrangler deploy) have been verified to work without modification.
